settings.name: Launch in dark theme
settings.description: Start Ultralight with dark chrome, toolbars, and tabs by default.

settings.name: Vibrant window theme
settings.description: Apply a subtle color wash to the window frame for a livelier finish.

settings.name: Transparent toolbar
settings.description: Blend the toolbar into page content with a translucent, glass-like surface.

settings.name: Compact tabs
settings.description: Reduce tab height and spacing so more tabs stay visible without scrolling.

settings.name: Enable ad blocking
settings.description: Filter network requests using bundled block lists to hide intrusive ads.

settings.name: Log blocked requests
settings.description: Write each blocked network request to the console for debugging rules.

settings.name: Clear history on exit
settings.description: Remove browsing history when Ultralight closes and skip saving new visits.

settings.name: Enable JavaScript
settings.description: Allow websites to run JavaScript code for interactive features and dynamic content.

settings.name: Enable web security
settings.description: Enforce same-origin policy and other web security restrictions.

settings.name: Block third-party cookies
settings.description: Prevent websites from setting cookies that track you across different sites.

settings.name: Send Do Not Track header
settings.description: Request that websites not track your browsing activity.

settings.name: Show address bar suggestions
settings.description: Surface history matches and popular sites while typing in the address bar.

settings.name: Show favicons in suggestions
settings.description: Display site icons next to suggestion rows whenever an icon is available.

settings.name: Show download badge
settings.description: Highlight the toolbar downloads button whenever transfers are active.

settings.name: Open downloads panel automatically
settings.description: Pop open the quick downloads overlay as soon as a new download begins.

settings.name: Ask where to save downloads
settings.description: Show a file picker dialog for each download instead of using default location.

settings.name: Smooth scrolling
settings.description: Enable smooth animated scrolling for a more fluid browsing experience.

settings.name: Hardware acceleration
settings.description: Use GPU to accelerate graphics rendering for better performance.

settings.name: Enable local storage
settings.description: Allow websites to store data locally for offline functionality.

settings.name: Enable database storage
settings.description: Allow websites to use IndexedDB and Web SQL for data storage.

settings.name: Reduce motion effects
settings.description: Limit animated transitions and parallax flourishes for a calmer experience.

settings.name: High contrast UI
settings.description: Boost contrast for overlays, menus, and dialogs to improve readability.

settings.name: Enable caret browsing
settings.description: Navigate web pages using keyboard cursor like in a text editor.

settings.name: Enable remote inspector
settings.description: Allow remote debugging via Chrome DevTools Protocol.

settings.name: Show performance overlay
settings.description: Display FPS counter and rendering statistics on screen.
